title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Security Tips for investigative journalists
description: This text outlines security tips for investigative journalists to protect sources, data, and communications, including avoiding leaving digital footprints, encrypting data and using secure storage, and being cautious of malware and phishing.
